featured.text: The organization encourages consumers to choose brands that take precautions to protect elephants and has set up a certification program to reward tea growers who are doing it right.
The Panchen Lamas were chosen in a similar way.
Moreover, a number of firms are creating cars that drive themselves to a chosen destination without a human at the controls.
And there are plenty of models from which to choose: from simple $200 point-and-shoot snappers to $1,000 wonders with all the features that any advanced amateur could want.
I don’t know which one to choose.

other.text: Boys’ names such as John, Peter, and Thomas are chosen from the Bible.
People may choose a name because they are strongly 38 a character in a book or a television series; they may also adopt names of famous people or their favorite actors and actresses.
Here are some tips ___(26)___ choosing an ideal one from a number of colleges.
From the 2012 bid onwards, the city chosen to host the Olympic Games will also host the Paralympics. 26.
The names were chosen from a name pool 36 of 140 names, 10 each from the 14 members of the committee.
Why was red chosen as the original color of the bindi?
That being said, I’m definitely a carnivore and prefer meat, but I don’t see anything wrong with choosing one of the fakey- fakey meaty things once in a while—just for a change.
Girls’ names such as Faith, Patience, and Sophie (wisdom) are chosen because they symbolize Christian qualities.
What does the author advise people to do with bedbug problems? (A) Choose the right fogger.
From (A) to (F) below, choose the ONES that are true for both jackdaws and turtle ants.
According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Folk healers choose different herbs to cure diseases without any sound basis.
David felt disappointed when he found out that he could not choose his study partners, but would be ______ placed in a study group.
The mark of heroes is not necessarily the result of their action, but 24 they are willing to do for others and for their chosen cause.
To encourage consumers to choose high-quality brands.

definition.zh_def: 選擇，挑選或決定某事物或某人。
definition.en_def: To select or make a decision about something or someone.
definition.example: You can choose any book you like from the shelf.
